Think better.
Achieve more.

Clover is your daily workspace: Notes, Tasks, Whiteboards and a
Daily Planner in a streamlined workflow.

Get Started for Free
Product Hunt's Tool of the Year
Available on Mac, Windows, iPad, iPhone, and the web.

Calendar-Based Note-Taking & Task Management

Plan your day.
Stay on task.

Traditional notes apps are great for writing, but getting things done requires something more. Clover’s Daily Notes introduce a new way of documenting thoughts, keeping track of tasks, and planning work within the context of your daily agenda.

Task Manager

Use Clover’s Daily Notes to plan tasks and capture thoughts throughout your day. Incomplete tasks automatically rollover to the next day.

Daily Planner

Take notes and capture todos alongside your calendar to ensure you’ll never forget a task, event, or thought.

The Ultimate
Digital Notebook

Clover is more than an excellent note-taking tool. It’s also a fully-fledged task manager, whiteboarding tool, and a daily planner. Manage your work from beginning to end with a single tool.

Manage Projects

Inline tasks make it simple to manage projects large and small. Add due dates, color-coding, and status, all alongside your notes. Plus, easily link to individual tasks or more extensive projects with Clover's powerful networking capabilities.

Rich Text

Markdown formatting, LaTeX, code blocks with syntax highlighting, inline task features, slash inserter, dynamic references, and much more, so you can write your notes and create tasks however works best for you.

Networked Notes

Network your ideas together. Link to other pages or deep link to specific blocks and Clover will automatically add backlinks to connect the pages.

Rich Media

Embed images, swatches, videos, audio, and more. Clover seamlessly integrates with tools like YouTube, Figma, and Soundcloud, enabling you to centralize your workflow in one easy-to-use tool.

Whiteboarding

Clover's Surface pages offer the same rich-text editor but on an infinite canvas for better brainstorming, enhanced memory, and intuitive organization.

Templating

Use preset templates for your notes and documents, or create your own! Clover comes with several templates, including Cornell Notes, Eisenhower Matrix, Timelines, and more.
